title: "The Monastery Of Sendomir" (1920) director Victor Sjöström (Seastrom)

sources.title: "The Monastery Of Sendomir" (1920) director Victor Sjöström (Seastrom)
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems     This is a short preview. You can watch the whole film here: https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/index.php/gems-for-donation     "The Monastery of Sendomir" is a poignant drama, featuring director Victor Sjöström (Seastrom), a star of Silent Hall of Fame. Victor Seastrom was successful in his native Sweden before making a career in the USA in 1924-1930.  A powerful count suspects his young wife of infidelity.  Will his quest for vengeance destroy everything he has and doom him to misery for the rest of his life?    Copyright Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976: "Allowance is made for "fair use" for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. Non-profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favor of fair use."
